articles.title: Markets News, July 28, 2025: S&P 500, Nasdaq Close at New Highs as Investors Await More Trade News, Brace for Big Tech Earnings, Fed Decision This Week - Investopedia
articles.description: Major stock indexes edged higher Monday to kick off what will be an extraordinarily busy week of news for financial markets.
articles.content:

articles.title: Microsoft Edge is now an AI browser with launch of ‘Copilot Mode’ - TechCrunch
articles.description: Microsoft's Edge browser introduces an AI-powered "Copilot Mode" for smarter web browsing.
articles.content: With demand for AI-powered browsers on the rise, Microsoft on Monday launched a new feature in its Edge browser called Copilot Mode, which allows users to browse the web while being assisted by AI. T… [+3246 chars]
